---
title: "Metadata Requirements"
---

Certain metadata fields are required for Project and Product metadata records. 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Using colors from this wesbite:
# https://designsystem.digital.gov/design-tokens/color/state-tokens/
# This allows the colors to be coded as a variable and, thus, easily changed.

required_color <- "#b50909"
required_if_applicable_color <- "#936f38"
if_applicable_color <- "#757575"
required_style <- paste0('{style="color:', required_color, ';"}')
req_if_app_style <- paste0('{style="color:', required_if_applicable_color,';"}')
if_app_style <- paste0('{style="color:', if_applicable_color, ';"}')
```


### Basic Information    

| Metadata Field                | Project Records   | Product Records   |
|:------------------------------|:-------------|:-------------|
| Status                        | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#status)`r required_style`^\*^ | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#status)`r required_style`^\*^  |
| Resource Type                 |                                                                       | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#resource-types)`r required_style`  |
| Points of Contact             |                                                                                         |                                                                      |
|        Point of Contact       | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style` | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style`|
|        Custodian              | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style` | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style`|
|        Administrator          | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style`^\*^ |     |
|        Administrative Region  | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style` | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r required_style`|
|        Principal Investigator | [**Required, if applicable**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r req_if_app_style`^\*^ |  [**Required, if applicable**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)`r req_if_app_style`^\*^    |
|        Co-Principal Investigator | [If applicable]`r if_app_style`                         | [If applicable]`r if_app_style`  |
| Abstract                      | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#abstract)`r required_style`^\*^     | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#abstract)`r required_style`^\*^      |
| Start Date                    | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#time-period)`r required_style`^\*^  | [If applicable]`r if_app_style`  |
| End Date                      | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#time-period)`r required_style`^\*^  | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#time-period)`r required_style`^\*^   |
: { .hover .bordered .md .allborder}

### Contact Information    
Certain metadata fields are required for Individual or Organization contacts.  

| Metadata Field                | Individual    | Organization    |
|:------------------------------|:-------------|:-------------|
| Type                | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |
| Individual Name     | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |                                                                                                  |
| Organizational Name |                                                                                                | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |
| Position Name       | [If applicable]`r if_app_style`                                                                |                                                                                                  |
| Contact Type        | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |
| Member Organization | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |                                                                                                  |
| Email Address       | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |
| Online Resource     |                                                                                                | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)`r required_style` |
| Physical Address    | [Best practice]`r if_app_style`                                                                | [Best practice]`r if_app_style` |
| Logo                |                                                                                                | [Optional]`r if_app_style`      |
: {.striped .hover .bordered .md .allborder}
